Class Cub

java.lang.Object
Animal
Cub
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chick, Egg
public class Cub extends Animal
The Cub class represents a specific type of animal that is a Cub. It extends the Animal class and includes additional information about the the age of a cub, the two boolean values represent whether a cub is counted and eaten.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    This additional boolean field will help for counting the monthly simulating summary.
    protected boolean

    This additional boolean field will help for check the death reason when counting the summary.

  • Field Details

    • age

      protected int age
      This is a integer field indicating the age of this object and the unit is month.

    • isEaten

      protected boolean isEaten
      This additional boolean field will help for check the death reason when counting the summary. it turns true if the object has been eaten, false otherwise

    • isCounted

      protected boolean isCounted
      This additional boolean field will help for counting the monthly simulating summary. it turns true if the object has been counted, false otherwise

  • Constructor Details

    • Cub

      public Cub()
      Default constructor for the Cub class. It calls the default constructor of the superclass (Animal) using the 'super' keyword. Initializes the cub as alive and sets the age to 0, and set false for two boolean fields.

    • Cub

      public Cub(boolean isAlive, int age, boolean isEaten, boolean isCounted)
      Parameterized constructor for the Cub class. Initializes the Cub with the specified life status,age by month, eaten status and counted status. It calls the parameterized constructor of the superclass (Animal) using the 'super' keyword
      Parameters:
      isAlive - The initial life status of the Cub (true if alive, false if dead).
      age - The age count by month unit of a cub.
      isEaten - The eaten status of the Cub (true if not eaten , false if eaten).
      isCounted - The initial life status of the Cub (true if not counted, false if counted).

  • Method Details

    • addAge

      protected void addAge()
      This method will add the one month age of the object.

    • changeToDie

      public void changeToDie()
      This method will set the object status to false.

    • getAge

      protected int getAge()
      Retrieves the current age of this object and the scale unit is month.
      Returns:
      The current age of this object.

    • getIsCounted

      protected boolean getIsCounted()
      Retrieves the current status of this object whether it is counted before.
      Returns:
      true if this object already counted,false otherwise.

    • getIsEaten

      protected boolean getIsEaten()
      Retrieves the current status of this object whether it is eaten.
      Returns:
      true if this object already eaten,false otherwise.

    • setAge

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides the toString() method to provide a string representation of the Cub object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Animal
